entities.settings

Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Dictionary<K,V>

          • entities.settings.Settings
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientSettings, ServerSettings

    public abstract class Settings
extends java.util.Properties
    Settings loading and managing any settings within a propertyfile.

    1.0

    • Constructor Detail

      • Settings

        public Settings()
        Creates the Settings.
        Since:
        1.0

      • Settings

        public Settings(boolean loadSettings)
         throws java.io.IOException
        Creates the Settings.

        Load settings from "settings/settings.properties" if loadSettings is true. Else no settings are loaded.

        Parameters:
        loadSettings - true if the settings should be loaded, else false
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if settings.properties do not exist, any problem while reading occurs or serverudp/servertcp/username/gamepath keys are missing
        Since:
        1.0

    • Method Detail

        public int getServerUdp()
        Returns:
        UDP-Port of the LANServer
        Since:

        public int getServerTcp()
        Returns:
        TCP-Port of the LANServer
        Since:
        1.0

      • save

        public void save()
          throws java.io.IOException
        Saves the settings to "settings/settings.properties".
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if any error while saving the properties occurs
        Since:
        1.0
